resources.string: File: %s is not a valid audio file.
Sorry, Barcode Scanner is not installed!
Remove group \"%s\" and all of its sub-groups?
To navigate, swipe your finger horizontally on the screen as if turning pages in a book. Press the Menu button for more choices.
Sorry, you have not selected any items!
Sorry, your memory card is not working!
Please save data to keep your responses.
You have reached the end of %s.
Failed sending %s item(s) - please try again
This screen displays information about your Inform installation. Certain details are only available to the account owner.
Information about the device you are currently using.
You have successfully created an account and registered this device! More information is available from the \"About Inform\" option menu.\n\nWe have sent an email to %s confirming this new account.
If you do not know these details you can have a reminder sent to the account owner.
Enter the email address of the person who will be the account owner. We will send important information to this address.
Select list item to begin new form

This software is available as a beta release but isn\'t quite ready for prime time.\n\nPlease send any questions, bug reports or suggestions to confab@groupcomplete.com or visit us on our website at http://groupcomplete.com

This multiple select field has more than one preselected list item. A single select field can only have one preselected item.

If you choose to change to a single select field all of the preselected list items will be unselected.

Do you wish to continue?
Regular groups are collections of like fields displayed under a common group label. Repeated groups are similar and allow the user to fill out one or more fields repeatedly.
Select the media type that this field should support.
Select the number type that this field should support.
Choose whether to allow the user to select one or more items from the selection list

This is a completed form.

Are you sure that you want to remove it?

This action can not be undone.
Do you want to remove this form?\n\nThis action can not be undone.
Are you sure you want to remove \"%s?\"

Unable to connect to the Inform service.

Please make sure that this device can access the Internet and try again in a few minutes.

If you choose to work offline the connection will be automatically reestablished as soon as it becomes available.
Unable to connect to the Inform service.\n\nPlease make sure that this device can access the Internet and try again in a few minutes.
Unable to connect to the Inform service to register this installation.\n\nPlease make sure that this device can access the Internet and try again in a few minutes.
Action reserved for your account owner!
The following free app will help to maximize the potential of Inform:\n\n
Identify this user by an alias instead of using the the email address. Examples: Joe Smith, North Warehouse or Survey Team.
The last time that this device checked in to your account.
The email address of the primary user of this device. This email address must be unique to your account.
If the device status is \"unused\" this PIN may be supplied during the registration process to reactivate this device profile.
Enter the email address of the person who will be using this device. The address must be unique to this Inform account.
User notified on your behalf via email
Enter the PIN of the unused profile to have it activated and assigned to this device.
A valid device PIN is required
You have successfully registered this device!
Are you registering a new device or reactivating an unused device profile?
If you have registered another device or have been told to use Inform by someone else then you probably have an account.\n\nDo you have an account?
Any value supplied here will be shown in the input area of the field and will be saved as-is unless otherwise changed by the user.
Hidden fields will appear in your exported data and may be manipulated by advanced properties but are not directly available to the user.
You may provide longer instructions or a hint to help the user understand how to use this field.
The name, prompt or question for this field.
Read-only fields will be visible to the user but they will not be able to modify them directly. The values of read-only fields may be manipulated by advanced properties.
Marking this field as required will force the user to respond to it before marking the form as complete.
Cannot save: this field must have a Label
A concise name for this folder.
A longer description explaining this folder.
Private folders are for your use only. Shared folders may be used by any of your account team members.
The form editor is currently unable to process forms with translated text.\n\nLocalization capabilities will be added in a future release.
You are currently online.\n\nFolders that are selected for offline use will be synchronized prior to going offline.
You are currently offline.\n\nFolders that are selected for offline use will be synchronized after going online.
Select language to add to form
Do you want to remove support for the %s language?
This will reset all translations for this %1$s and enable the %1$s input field in the field editor.
This PIN is not registered with our system. Double check the PIN and try again.
Cannot save: label and value required
Checking this box will cause this item to be preselected when the list of items is displayed.
Text shown to users making a selection from the list.
Value stored in the output record when this item is selected.
Cannot save: item must have a unique value

All of the %1$s licences available to your %2$s account are in use.

Please contact the account owner to remove any unneeded device profiles or to add more licences to the account.

Account owners: please visit
http://groupcomplete.com for more information on Simple Sharing plans and pricing.
Unable to validate this licence. Double check both values and try again!
Nothing available to display.\n\nUse this screen to upload completed forms from the current folder to ODK Aggregate.

You are currently working offline. Only those folders that have been synchronized for offline use are available at this time.\n\nPlease note that some parts of this app will be unavailable while offline.
Please wait 5 minutes after device reset
This email address is already in use

Welcome to Inform: mobile data collection made easy! This installation must be registered before it can be used.

All mobile devices used by your team must be registered to the same account. Please have your licence number and key handy.

If you do not have an account then one will be created for you during this registration process.

Collaborative data collection with Inform is made possible by our Simple Sharing services. New accounts receive a Free Simple Sharing subscription as per our website.

Please visit http://groupcomplete.com for more information on Simple Sharing plans & pricing.
Reminder sent to the account owner
Could not remove %s: group contains fields.\n\nRemove the inner fields first.

IMPORTANT - PLEASE READ

This operation cannot be reversed! If you remove this registered profile the following things will happen:

1) The associated device will reset itself the next time it checks in with Inform. Following this the user will no longer be able to access this account.

2) This alias or email address will continue to appear in association with records in various places but no further operations will be able to be performed using this device profile.

3) You will be assigned as the owner of any folders currently associated with this user.

IMPORTANT - PLEASE READ

This operation cannot be reversed! All form templates, drafts and completed forms contained in this folder will be lost upon removal.

If you need any of this information export it before removing this folder.
Hint: this is probably the email address of the person in your team that told you to use Inform.
Enter the email address of the account owner. A reminder email containing the licence info will be sent to this person.
Inform has been successfully reset.\n\nAll data created by Inform has been removed from this device.
We were unable to reset this device. This is probably due to a problem communicating with Inform servers.\n\nPlease make sure that your device has Internet access and try again.

IMPORTANT - PLEASE READ

Selecting "reset" will remove all Inform data stored on this device and cause this device to forget its device registration. This will not uninstall the Inform app.

You should only perform a reset in one of the following situations:

a) You have been advised to do so by our customer support, or

b) This device is being given to another person who should not have access to Inform.

If you need to access the data associated with this device after resetting you must reactivate this device profile by using the current licence number, key and device PIN.

Device profiles may be reactivated during the device registration process.

IMPORTANT - PLEASE READ

Selecting "reset" will remove all Inform data stored on this device and cause this device to forget its device registration. This will not uninstall the Inform app.

You should only perform a reset in one of the following situations:

a) You have been advised to do so by our customer support, or

b) This device is being given to another person who should not have access to Inform.

This device profile may be reactivated by using the current licence number, key and device PIN during the registration process.
We encountered a system error. A team of trained monkeys has been dispatched to fix the problem. Please try again later!
Only the owner of a folder may make changes to it.\n\nPlease contact the owner of this folder if you think that changes are in order.

The Inform database is required to work offline. If you are receiving this message it means that the database is unavailable for one or more reasons.\n\nPlease let us know that you are receiving this message by visiting us at http://groupinform.com/support - thank you!
Select at least one folder to be synchronized for offline use prior to going offline.

Inform was unable to connect to the Simple Sharing service to go offline.

This usually means that this device cannot access the Internet.

This device will be forced into offline mode until a connection can be automatically restablished.
Please make sure that this device can access the Internet and try again.

Changes cannot be made to form templates when either draft or completed copies of the form are present.

Support for changes to forms with drafts/completed copies will be made available in a future version of this app.

If you wish to make changes to this form template either make a copy of it or remove all drafts/completed copies before editing it.

The form(s) that you were looking for cannot be retrieved.

This information was most likely removed recently by one of your team members.

Press OK to refresh the screen.
Unable to notify user at this time. Please try again later.
The folder \"%s\" is currently unavailable.\n\nPlease select another folder and try again later.

The selected folder is currently unavailable.

This might be because the owner of the folder has removed it or made it private.

Please select another folder and try again later.
The folder \"%s\" is unavailable while offline.\n\nPlease go online to access this folder or select a folder that is synchronized for offline use.
A licence number and key are required

Our records indicate that the device profile associated with this PIN is currently in use.

If you have access to this device then you should reset Inform before reusing this profile.

If you cannot reset Inform then you should notify the person who uses this device. Additional instructions will be sent to this person.
This special folder cannot be removed
Unable to remove form at this time. Please try again later.
Before removing support for this language you must remove all of its translations by editing the affected fields and using the label & description translation screens.
Cannot reset this device from here
Changes cannot be saved while offline
The Barcode Scanner app allows Inform to scan, decode and store all major forms of barcodes.\n\nBarcode scanning technology is very useful for inventory or warehouse operations.

CouchDB allows Inform to store forms and data locally on your device.

This technology enables you to access your data while offline and keeps your information synchronized with the rest of your team.

Install CouchDB to get the most out of Inform.
Are you sure you want to delete, this will delete all of your existing data?
There was an error fetching the binaries, are you online? Please try again.
